tag_list: ontargetjobs, cloutier, jobs, regionalhelpwanted, medhunters, biospace, hcareers, healthecareers, radio, broadcasting, bc, coupon, teamsave, groupon, living-social, toronto, rochester, naples, pioneer, broadcaster, voice-over, talent, lewiston, maine, ent
overview:
BC Cloutier is currently CEO, Co-founder and Director at TeamSave.com, the first and largest group buying site in Canada and a fast mover in the US market. He also serves as a Strategic Consultant to several online brands including Cupid.com and BeNaughty.com. He is also an angel investor in several startups and serves on the board of two small online enterprises.

He was formerly Executive VP, Product for onTargetjobs – the parent company of several job boards including RegionalHelpWanted.com, HealthECareers.com, HCareers.com, MedHunters.com, JobShop.ca, Cupid.com, BioSpace.com, DeviceSpace.com and others.

Cloutier previously was EVP & Director of Sales for RegionalHelpWanted.com, which he co-founded in 2000 and for which he served as a Director. He also co-founded online dating site Cupid.com and Canadian job board network JobShop.ca Prior to 2000, Cloutier spent 20 years in various executive positions in the broadcasting industry with Infinity Broadcasting/CBS Radio, Heritage Media Corporation and Entercom.

milestones.description: Sold RegionalHelpWanted.com, JobShop.ca and Cupid.com to onTargetjobs, Inc.
milestones.source_description: RegionalHelpWanted Sold To Warburg Pincus-Backed Firm For $100 Million

milestones.description: Co-founded TeamSave.com with Chris Nguyen and Lee Liu
